CustomField.formula: CASE(Target_Partner__c , "Basic Lead", 0,"Target Partner", 3,"SCTP",5,"Dreamlist",15,0) + CASE(Feature_Competitor__c, "No",0,"Yes",2,"Top Competitor Account",4,0) + (IF( Number_of_Reviews__c < 10,0, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(External_Rating__c,"1"),Number_of_Reviews__c >= 10),-5, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(External_Rating__c,"2"),Number_of_Reviews__c >= 10),-2, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(External_Rating__c,"3"),Number_of_Reviews__c >= 10),0, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(External_Rating__c,"4"),Number_of_Reviews__c >= 10),5, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(External_Rating__c,"5"),Number_of_Reviews__c >= 10),10,0) ))))) + IF((Number_of_Restaurants__c -1) > 5, 5, IF((Number_of_Restaurants__c -1) <=0,0, (Number_of_Restaurants__c -1))))
CustomField.label: Vendor Score
